translations.translation: Ordering an MX PLAN
In order to configure an MX plan, you need at least one domain.
1. MX Plan configuration
Domain
Type of sevice
An error has occurred recovering your order details ({0}).
2. Select a service
For more information, please see our product descriptions. {2}
An error has occurred retrieving the available durations.
An error has occurred searching for available prices for this duration.
Pay for your order and the service will be linked to your domain name without any request for renewal.
3. Validation
I confirm that I have read and understood the Terms & conditions.
Click on "Generate the purchase order" to order your MX Plan.
Please read and confirm the terms and conditions below, then click on "Next":
Generate purchase order
Generating the order...
The order was successfully generated.
To confirm your order please click on the "Pay" button below.
Pay
A new tab will open and you will automatically be redirected to the OVH payment interface.
An error has occurred generating the purchase order.
